trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity"></xref> class encapsulates the MSMQ security features available when using the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
Objects of this type are created by creating an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
You can then use this object to reference all of the various security settings related to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding> binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq> encapsulates the SOAP message security settings.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverMsmq"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
This property determines the type of security used by the associated NetMsmqBinding.
The following list describes the acceptable values:
**Both** - both message-based security and transport security is used.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
Value is not one of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqSecurityMode"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
This property allows access to MSMQ Transport security settings.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NetMsmqBinding"></xref> binding.
